short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for jobs on LinkedIn with auto-scrolling

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension simplifies your job search by letting you add your desired job preferences. It then automatically scans various job platforms to find matching opportunities and delivers a list of relevant jobs, complete with direct links. Save time and focus on the jobs that matter most to you!
